description: This file defines a custom permission class 'IsOwnerOrReadOnly' for a Django REST Framework API, allowing object owners to edit/delete their objects while providing read-only access to others.

classes.name: IsOwnerOrReadOnly
classes.description: A Django REST Framework permission class that grants read-only access to everyone but allows owners to edit or delete their objects.

methods.name: has_object_permission(self, request, view, obj)
methods.description: Determines if the request should be permitted for the object, granting access if the request method is safe or if the user is the owner of the object.
